title: Orange Steak
description: Crispy beef tossed with vegetables in classic orange sauce.

description: Sliced tender beef sauteed with vegetables in five-flavored sauce.

title: Beef with Broccoli
description: Fresh broccoli sauteed with sliced tender beef in brown sauce.

title: Teriyaki Steak
description: Grilled steak glazed with the teriyaki sauce and served with steamed vegetables.

description: Grilled steak glazed with the teriyaki sauce and served with steamed vegetables.

title: Mongolian Beef
description: Sliced tender beef with scallions, onions, and bamboo shoots sauteed with hoisin sauce.

title: Kung Pao Beef
description: A quick fired traditional dish with peanuts, chili peppers, and vegetables.

title: Beef with Vegetables
description: Sliced tender beef sauteed with fresh vegetables in brown sauce.

title: Beef Delight
